testcase.name: TC1 User can create an account
testcase.system-out: When Launch browser.........................................................passed Then Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'........................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then Click on 'Signup / Login' button.......................................passed Then Verify 'New User Signup!' is visible...................................passed And Enter name and email address............................................passed Then Click 'Signup' button..................................................passed Then Verify that 'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' is visible.....................passed Then Fill details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth..............passed Then Select checkbox Sign up for our newsletter!............................passed Then Select checkbox Receive special offers from our partners!..............passed Then Fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed Then Click Create Account button............................................passed Then Verify that ACCOUNT CREATED! is visible................................passed And Click Continue button...................................................passed Then Verify that Logged in as username is visible...........................passed Then Click Delete Account button............................................passed Then Verify that ACCOUNT DELETED! is visible and click Continue button......passed Then capture the screenshot.................................................passed
